technologyImpact.title:
Deliver the Color Without Distortion
AI-Based High-Precision Color Measurement Solution
technologyImpact.description: We define color without sensation by combining algorithms and patented technologies.

item1.title: Calibration, the Standard of True Color
item1.description: We deliver quantified color values through our proprietary color correction technology.

item2.title: Precision Achieved by Algorithm
item2.description: TGRID's algorithm, trained with OpenCV and deep learning libraries, defines color without sensation.

item3.title: TGRID, Proven by Patents
item3.description: TGRID is a solution for medical color standards, validated by patents and papers.

patent1.subTitle: Dental Color Correction and Determination

item4.title: Visualizing Color with New Inventory System
item4.description: TGRID introduces a new inventory system and visualizes color with color maps.

timeline.title:
From Problem to Vision
T-GRID's Journey
timeline.subTitle: Starting from the long-standing problem in dentistry and dental labs, we have developed a technology that solves the problem and creates new value for patients and the industry. Now, we are expanding our technology to various industries beyond dentistry.

problem.title: Problem
problem.subTitle: The long-standing problem in dentistry and dental labs
problem.content: It has always been difficult to match the color of teeth. Even with high-priced equipment and a complex shooting process, it was not satisfactory, and the rework rate was high. Dental labs still had to rely on subjective judgment.

technology.title: Technology
technology.subTitle: AI-based high-precision color measurement
technology.content: We defined color without sensation by combining algorithms and patented technologies. Calibration and Ground Truth-based correction, OpenCV and deep learning enable everyone to reproduce the same color under the same conditions. We have proven the reliability of our technology through patents and papers.

workflow.title: Workflow
workflow.subTitle: Optimized for digital dentistry processes
workflow.content: Dental scanning → CAD design → production → color application and shade adjustment → final staining. T-GRID provides precise color analysis at the color application stage, improving patient satisfaction and production efficiency.

impact.title: Impact
impact.subTitle: Improved patient satisfaction and production efficiency
impact.content: Quantified color data reduces rework rates and eliminates unnecessary complaints. Improved communication between dental clinics and dental labs, and patients can enjoy a better experience.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subTitle: Precise color, global standard
vision.content: We are expanding our technology to various industries beyond dentistry. Precise color is a new language that transcends borders, and a global standard that all industries can share.

beyondDentistry.title: Beyond Dentistry
beyondDentistry.subTitle: Agriculture, education platforms, XR-based real-time color recognition, and more. Our technology is expanding to various industries beyond dentistry.
beyondDentistry.content: Agriculture, education platforms, XR-based real-time color recognition, and more. Our technology is expanding to various industries beyond dentistry.
